lead_paragraph: Wake Forest promoted the assistant coach Dino Gaudio to succeed Skip Prosser, the head coach who died of an apparent heart attack July 26. Athletic Director Ron Wellman, who signed the 50-year-old Gaudio to a five-year contract, praised his strength during the two weeks of grieving after Prosser’s death. The speedy hiring appeared aimed at emphasizing stability and continuity to a recruiting class that was ranked as one of the nation’s best.
